normalised: Then there's twenty sixth January nineteen fifty. Republic Day, of course. The day our Constitution came into effect. Remember those massive parades on Rajpath, now Kartavya Path? My grandfather always used to say it's the day India truly became its own boss. I always wondered what he meant, but I think I get it now. Also, important side note: this date shifted the Indian Standard Time (I-S-T) ahead by thirty minutes!
